org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.remotese.transport

Interface DtoSender

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClientNode, DtoNode, ServerNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalClient, LocalServer

    public interface DtoSender
    Components that sends a DTO over the network to the other end. (slave or master) It can be an observer for KeypleDto to propagate them through the network

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getNodeId()
      Get the nodeId of this DtoSender, must identify the terminal.
      void sendDTO(KeypleDto message)
      Send DTO with no common information (usually a new message)
      void sendDTO(TransportDto message)
      Send DTO with common information

    • Method Detail

      • sendDTO

        void sendDTO(TransportDto message)
        Send DTO with common information
        Parameters:
        message - to be sent
        Throws:
        KeypleRemoteException - if a problem occurs while sending the message

      • sendDTO

        void sendDTO(KeypleDto message)
        Send DTO with no common information (usually a new message)
        Parameters:
        message - to be sent
        Throws:
        KeypleRemoteException - if a problem occurs while sending the message

      • getNodeId

        java.lang.String getNodeId()
        Get the nodeId of this DtoSender, must identify the terminal. ie : androidDevice2
        Returns:
        : nodeId
